resources.string: Unlock the secret to perfect hair with Hairapy

string-array.name: dandruff
string-array.item: Use anti-dandruff shampoos containing zinc pyrithione or selenium sulfide.
Wash your hair regularly and make sure to rinse it thoroughly.
Avoid hair products with harsh chemicals.

string-array.name: psoriasis
string-array.item: Use specialized shampoos containing tar or salicylic acid.
Avoid scratching your scalp to prevent irritation.
Consult a doctor for appropriate medical treatment.

string-array.name: hair_loss
string-array.item: Use shampoos and conditioners containing biotin and keratin.
Consume foods rich in vitamin E, iron, and protein.
Avoid excessive use of heat styling tools.

string-array.name: hair_greasy
string-array.item: Wash your hair with shampoos specifically designed for hair greasy, containing ingredients like tea tree oil or salicylic acid.
Avoid brushing your hair too frequently, as this can stimulate oil production.
Rinse your hair with warm (not hot) water to avoid over-stimulating the oil glands.
